flashcards.front: Он сел в трамвай и поехал домой.

back.source_phrase: Он сел в трамвай и поехал домой.
back.translation: He got on the tram and went home.
I want to become a tram driver.
It's too late. The trams aren't running.
I bought two kilos of apples.
A kilogram of broccoli costs one hundred rubles.
